q: Tom Watson, a Labour lawmaker, said the Andy Coulson controversy raises questions about David Cameron 's judgment and should trigger a deeper investigation of Murdoch's media empire. The New Sarah Ferguson Times quoted Watson as saying: Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street-we need to get to the truth.
